Authors: Pambudi A.B., Ramadhan M.H., Hutabarat D.P.G.
Title: Optimization call detail record in oracle communication monitoring system – performance intelligence center (Oc – pic) on ss7 international sms network
Source title: International Journal of Emerging Trends in Engineering Research
Affiliations: Computer Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Pambudi, A.B., Computer Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Ramadhan, M.H., Computer Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Hutabarat, D.P.G., Computer Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Introduce a dynamic categorization for clustering and searching task by SS7 basics, ISUP call flow, SCCP(MAP) transaction and Eagle STPasaSS7router.Research method were conducted by problem identification and domonitoring SS7 using monitoring tools OC-PIC integration from Signal Transfer Point(STP) to do tracingSS7 call and SMS transaction. OC-PIC (Oracle Communications Performance Intelligence Center) perform as database application whichisSTPintegrationtotakedataafteridentificationtheproble m.The result of this thesis was that can optimize configuration so that can be easier to solve the problem and avoid transaction data that is separated especially in SMS.It can be concluded configuration can reduce not appropriate transaction data. © 2020, World Academy of Research in Science and Engineering. All rights reserved.
